description: This file defines a Spring Boot global exception handler that maps specific exceptions to standardized HTTP error responses, primarily for a chess game backend.

classes.name: GlobalExceptionHandler
classes.description: A Spring @ControllerAdvice component that handles exceptions globally and returns structured error responses for the frontend or API consumers.

methods.name: body
methods.description: Constructs a ResponseEntity with a standardized JSON body containing timestamp, status, error, and message.

methods.name: handleNotFound
methods.description: Handles GameNotFoundException and returns a 404 error response.

methods.name: handleBadRequest
methods.description: Handles multiple exceptions related to bad requests and returns a 400 error response.
